fields.label: Background image
fields.description: Select an image to use as the background of the board.

fields.label: Background color
fields.description: Choose a color to use as the background of the board.

fields.label: Card types that the user may add
Dialog text delete card
fields.default: Do you really want to delete this card?

fields.label: Unknown field type
fields.default: Fields of type '@type' are not supported.

fields.label: Field required
fields.default: This field is required and cannot be empty.

fields.label: Number minimum value
fields.default: The value must be greater than or equal to @min.

fields.label: Number maximum value
fields.default: The value must be less than or equal to @max.

fields.label: Text too long
fields.default: The text is too long. Maximum length is @max characters.

fields.label: Instructions for the board
fields.default: Use the space bar to interact with card item or tab to the context menu.

fields.label: Context menu
fields.description: @denominator is a placeholder and will be replaced by the respective value.

fields.label: Add content type
fields.description: @contentType is a placeholder and will be replaced by the respective value.

fields.label: Resize
fields.default: Leave move mode. Use arrow keys to move the card.

fields.label: Resize
fields.default: Leave resize mode. Use arrow keys to resize the card.

fields.label: Card brought to front
fields.default: The card was brought to front.

fields.label: Card sent to back
fields.default: The card was sent to back.

fields.label: Card at
fields.description: @current is a placeholder and will be replaced by the respective value.

fields.label: Card x of y
fields.description: @current and @total are placeholders and will be replaced by the respective values.

fields.label: Give rating of
fields.description: @rating is a placeholder and will be replaced by the respective value.
fields.default: Rate this card with a rating of @rating.

fields.label: Rating changed
fields.description: @rating is a placeholder and will be replaced by the respective value.

fields.label: Paste no content
fields.default: No H5P content on the clipboard

fields.label: Paste content not supported
fields.default: The content in the H5P clipboard is not supported in this context

fields.label: Paste content too old
fields.default: The content in the H5P clipboard is of a lower version (@clip) than what is supported in this context (@local), if possible try to have the content you want to paste upgraded, copy it again and try pasting it here

fields.label: Paste content too new
fields.default: The content in the H5P clipboard is of a higher version (@clip) than what is supported in this context (@local), if possible try to have this content upgraded first, and then try pasting the content here again

fields.label: Paste content disabled
fields.default: No suitable content to be pasted
